description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1. Maintenance the Warehouse management system:
              
              - Combine software modules
              
              - EDI set up
              
              - Make report formats
              
              - Maintenance the software.
              
              - Setup API to communicate with customer's system
              
              2. Develop internal-use softwares
              
              3. Report to Manager about working progress, problem (if any)
              
              (Newcomers will be trained by Japanese/Singapore experts before working)
              

              ** Benefit:
              
              - Chances for development and promotion in a professional working environment.
              
              - Annual health check (2 times/year)
              
              - HI - UI - SI, Advanced Healthcare package (Medical, Dental) and 24/24 accident insurance package.
              
              - Miscellaneous allowance: Parking, Lunch, Phone, Uniform, ....
              
              - 13th++ month salary.
              
              - Other benefits are according to Vietnam Law and as company's regulations.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Graduated from college or university with major of Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering or related fields.
              
              - Knowledge about database (Oracle).
              
              - IT programmer at any language, JAVA language is preferable
              
              - NO EXPERIENCE required, Fresh-Graduation programmers are welcome.
              
              - Required skills:
              
              Good communication in English (written and verbal)
              
              Self-learning skill, well-organized, high sense of responsibility.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn

skill: Software Developer (both Graduated and Experienced Positions Available)
